## Main Application

### VoiceOS Core App
**Location**: `/app/`  
**Package**: `com.augmentalis.voiceos`

#### Key Classes:
- **VoiceOS.kt**: Main application class with direct module access
- **MainActivity.kt**: Primary activity
- **SettingsActivity.kt**: Configuration interface
- **DiagnosticsActivity.kt**: System diagnostics
- **AccessibilitySetupActivity.kt**: Accessibility setup
- **HelpActivity.kt**: Help and documentation
- **OnboardingActivity.kt**: User onboarding

#### Architecture:
- Direct module access (no CoreManager wrapper)
- Coroutine-based initialization
- Singleton module instances
- Zero abstraction overhead

## Libraries

### SpeechRecognition
**Location**: `/libraries/SpeechRecognition/`  
**Package**: `com.augmentalis.voiceos.speech`  
**Status**: ‚úÖ COMPLETE

#### Purpose:
Unified multi-engine speech recognition system with TTS and translation capabilities

#### Core Components:
- **Text-to-Speech (TTS)**: Delegates to AccessibilityManager for voice output
- **Translation Services**: Real-time language translation for voice commands
- **Speech Recognition**: Multi-engine STT processing

#### Speech Engines:
- **AndroidSTTEngine**: Android native speech recognition
- **GoogleCloudEngine**: Google Cloud Speech-to-Text
- **VivokaEngine**: Vivoka SDK integration
- **VoskEngine**: Offline Vosk recognition
- **WhisperEngine**: OpenAI Whisper integration

#### Common Components:
- **VoiceStateManager**: Centralized voice state
- **CommandProcessor**: Command processing pipeline
- **ErrorRecoveryManager**: Error handling and recovery
- **AudioStateManager**: Audio state management
- **ResultProcessor**: Result normalization
- **TimeoutManager**: Timeout management
- **CommandCache**: Command caching

#### Key Classes:
- **SpeechConfiguration.kt**: Configuration management
- **SpeechListeners.kt**: Event listener interfaces
- **RecognitionResult.kt**: Result data structures

### DeviceManager
**Location**: `/libraries/DeviceManager/`  
**Package**: `com.augmentalis.devicemanager`  
**Status**: ‚úÖ COMPLETE

#### Purpose:
Comprehensive device capability and hardware management

#### Core Classes:
- **DeviceManager.kt**: Main manager (singleton)
- **DeviceInfo.kt**: Device information and metrics
- **NetworkManager.kt**: Network management
- **XRManager.kt**: XR and spatial computing

#### Hardware Managers:
- **BluetoothManager**: Bluetooth Classic, LE, Mesh
- **WiFiManager**: WiFi 6E/7, Direct, Aware, RTT
- **UwbManager**: Ultra-Wideband ranging
- **LidarManager**: LiDAR/ToF depth sensing
- **BiometricManager**: Multi-modal authentication

#### Audio Management:
- **AudioService**: Main audio control
- **SpatialAudio**: Spatial audio processing
- **AudioEffects**: Audio effects and enhancement
- **AudioEnhancement**: Audio quality improvement

#### Specialized Managers:
- **DisplayOverlayManager**: Display and overlay management
- **VideoManager**: Video processing and management
- **FoldableDeviceManager**: Foldable device support

## Architecture Component Responsibilities

### Component Distribution
The VOS4 architecture distributes functionality across modules as follows:

#### SpeechRecognition Library (`/libraries/SpeechRecognition/`)
- **Text-to-Speech (TTS)**: Stays in SpeechRecognition, delegates to AccessibilityManager
- **Translation Services**: Stays in SpeechRecognition for voice command translation
- **Multi-Engine STT**: Vosk, Vivoka, Google, Whisper engines with unified learning

#### VoiceUI Application (`/apps/VoiceUI/`)
- **System Accessibility Settings**: Unified preferences interface in VoiceUI
- **System Settings Interface**: Central configuration management
- **Magic Components**: Advanced voice-first UI components

#### VoiceAccessibility Application (`/apps/VoiceAccessibility/`)
- **Screen Reader**: Advanced UI scraping and content reading system
- **Accessibility Service**: Complete Android accessibility service implementation
- **Voice Control**: Full voice-to-touch automation

### Integration Pattern
```
Voice Input ‚Üí SpeechRecognition (STT+TTS+Translation)
             ‚Üì
Settings ‚Üí VoiceUI (System Settings Interface)
         ‚Üì
Screen Reading ‚Üí VoiceAccessibility (Screen Reader + Service)
```

---

## Key Dependencies & Integration Points

### External Libraries
- **ObjectBox**: Database ORM with KAPT
- **Vosk**: Offline speech recognition
- **Whisper**: OpenAI speech recognition
- **Vivoka SDK**: Commercial speech engine
- **Google Cloud Speech**: Cloud-based recognition
- **AndroidX**: Lifecycle, Compose, Navigation

### Inter-Module Communications
- **AIDL**: Cross-process service communication
- **Intent System**: Component activation and data passing
- **Content Providers**: Shared data access
- **StateFlow/Flow**: Reactive state management

---

## Build Configuration

### Gradle Structure
- **Kotlin DSL**: build.gradle.kts configuration
- **Multi-module**: Parallel builds enabled
- **KAPT**: Annotation processing for ObjectBox
- **Compose**: Modern UI toolkit

### Target Specifications
- **Android API**: 31+ (Android 12+)
- **Kotlin**: Latest stable version
- **Gradle**: 8.x with configuration cache

## Naming Violations to Fix

### HUDManager Package Issues
- **AccessibilityEnhancer** ‚Üí Should be **Enhancer** (already in accessibility package)

### General Guidelines
- NO version suffixes (V2, V3, New, Enhanced, Refactored)
- NO redundant prefixes when package provides context
- Direct implementations preferred over interfaces
